text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryRoss ... Soon to be followed by an economic disaster as States will need to re-close due to  #Coronavirus outbreaks. @RealDonaldTrump put too much pressure on Governors and never had a National Plan to handle this #Pandemic.  117,000 Dead and counting.
